com.haojie.dao.userDao

接口 UserDao

  • 所有已知实现类:
    UserDaoImpl

    public interface UserDao
    The Dao layer designed for the traveluser table.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

      Get all the friends of a specified user

    • 方法详细资料

      • insertAUser

        ActionResult insertAUser(User user)
        Insert a new user into the database
        参数:
        user - The user object
        返回:
        Actionresult object.

      • tryLogin

        ActionResult tryLogin(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      java.lang.String newSessionID)
        Try login and update the sessionID
        参数:
        username - username
        password - password
        newSessionID - The new sessionID. In this method, the user's sessionID stored in the database will be changed to the new sessionID
        返回:
        ActionResult object.

      • tryAutoLogin

        User tryAutoLogin(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String sessionID)
        Try auto login according to username and sessionid
        参数:
        username - username
        sessionID - sessionid
        返回:
        If login succeed, the user object entity will be returned. Otherwise ,you'll get a null.

      • searchUserToAddFriend

        java.util.List<User> searchUserToAddFriend(java.lang.String username)
        To search the possible users when a user is trying to add friends
        参数:
        username - username
        返回:
        The list of user

      • userExists

        boolean userExists(java.lang.String username)
        To check whether a user has existed in the database
        参数:
        username - username
        返回:
        If exists, returns true. Otherwise, false.

      • getUser

        User getUser(java.lang.String username)
        Get the user entity
        参数:
        username - username
        返回:
        The user entity

      • getUser

        User getUser(int uid)
        Get the user entity
        参数:
        uid - uid
        返回:
        The user object entity

      • getMyFriendList

        java.util.List<User> getMyFriendList(int myuid)
        Get all the friends of a specified user
        参数:
        myuid - The uid of the operator
        返回:
        The user list

      • setCanBeSeenFavor

        boolean setCanBeSeenFavor(int uid,
                          int canBeSeenFavor)
        To configure whether a user's favors can be seen by his or her friends
        参数:
        uid - The user's uid
        canBeSeenFavor - Two options. 1 represents can, while 0 represents cannot.
        返回:
        If action succeeds, returns true. Otherwise, returns false.
